Text: Hi Ipmark thanks again for maps any chance you would have gmapsupp.img of south america thanks.

Trying to make a combo of US and Mexico from one of your other ul's.  Joined them using gmaptool and setting the the versionin header to 0.  Now how do I get the img file into mapsource so I can seltect the areas I want and upload the map?
Thanks!

You can't.
If you need a map with a "custom" selection of sub-maps, you have to use a Mapsource version instead of already compiled maps.
The "unlocked IMG" maps can't be loaded in Mapsource without loosing the address search function.
